channel.title: Need help with my client
channel.description:
My basic problem with my Client is when i open run.bat it comes up with this
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: /;//Class; Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .;..Class; at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: .;./Class;. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I need someone who can help me fix this problem
I can offer anyone who helps me moderator on my server when it's up

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @Hondaman Hondaman
item.description:

My basic problem with my Client is when i open run.bat it comes up with this
